google.title: Learn Dutch - 5,000 Phrases
google.description: Play, Learn and Speak â€“ discover common phrases for daily Dutch conversation! âœ” 5,000 useful phrases for conversation. âœ” Learn Dutch in your tongue (60 languages available). âœ” Best FREE app for learning fast. Speak Dutch Fluently in Real Conversations With Learn Dutch application, you can now explore over 5,000 Dutch phrases for short daily conversations while having absolutely pure fun! Whether youâ€™re a tourist having a vacation in an Dutch speaking country or someone who just wants to speak a foreign language, this application will help you learn Dutch phrases in a fast, easy and enjoyable way. Why Our FREE App is Different âœ” No internet connection required â€“ play where you want and when you want (offline). âœ” 5,000 common phrases â€“ audio pronunciations and phonetic transcriptions to show you how native speaker from Netherlands actually pronounce them. âœ” 11 fun games â€“ a innovative approach to practice your listening, writing and speaking skills. âœ” 4 levels for learning: beginner, intermediate, advanced and expert. âœ” 20 topics divided into 145 subtopics â€“ so youâ€™ll know what and when to say each phrase. Topics for Dutch conversation: Greetings, Conversations with friends, Basic sentences, Travel, Transportation, Hotel, Restaurant, Food, Shopping, Work, Business etc. More Features to Improve Your Dutch Speaking Vocabulary âœ” Search and bookmark your most common expressions from the phrasebook. âœ” Earn points as your Dutch skills progress. âœ” â€œRandom Categoriesâ€ feature to randomly select the topic, subtopic and game. âœ” 60 languages â€“so you could understand and speak each phrase easily regardless of which country youâ€™re from. About FunEasyLearn: Fun Easy Learn has developed many applications to help people around the world learn foreign languages for free. Fun Easy Learn applications improve your Dutch skills: speaking, listening and grammar. The dictionary of the apps has human voice pronunciation for each common phrase to improve your speaking skill. Speak Dutch easily and fluently for travel, business or fun!
